resources.string: To use the floating interface Parkado needs permission to overwrite screen content.
Parkado needs to access the user location.
Having denied permission Parkado can not show the floating interface.
Having denied permission Parkado can not acquire user location.
Sorry there was an error with Google services. Please restart Parkado.
Sorry there was an error with retrieving your address.
Please enable GPS and try again.
Oops! Looks like there is little problem..
